content:
Resort Amenities

  • Basketball Courts (Indoor/Outdoor) ($)
  • Beachfront Deck
  • Beach Volleyball
  • Bowling (8 Lanes)
  • Children's Pool
  • Daily Coffee & Tea Replenishment*
  • Fitness Center
  • Gaming Arcade
  • H2Oooohh! Indoor Water Park ($)
  • Heated Swimming Pools (2)
  • Kids Activity Program ($)
  • Laundry Facilities ($)
  • Local and toll-free calls*
  • Recreational Activities: Board Games, Card Games, Billiards, Ping Pong, Nintendo Wii Games, Bingo ($), Ship Board Racing ($), Turtle Races ($)
  • Safe Deposit at Front Desk*
  • Sauna
  • Shuttle Service (On Property)*
  • Soaking Tubs (2)
  • Tennis Courts (Indoor/Outdoor) ($)
  • WiFi Internet Access (Galleria, Willowbrook, Lodge Lobby)*

*A $3.00 per-person, per-day recreation fee will be added to the daily room rate. This fee allows guests to enjoy the hotel services and activities indicated with an asterisk above (*) without having to incur miscellaneous charges.

($) Indicates a separate fee applies.
